articles.title: Covid-19 infection can cause structural changes in lungs: Study - BusinessLine
articles.description: Covid-19 positive patients can experience symptoms such as blood clotting, loss of smell and taste
articles.content:
A study published in The Lancets eBioMedicine, by Kings College London, suggested that a significant amount of lung damage has been observed in patients who died due to coronavirus infection.
